pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Step Adaptive Elastic-Net // Multi-step adaptive elastic- net (MSAENet) algorithm for feature selection in high- dimensional regressions proposed in Xiao and Xu (2015) DOI:10.1080/00949655.2015.1016944, with additional support for multi-step adaptive MCP-Net (MSAMNet) and multi-step adaptive SCAD-Net (MSASNet) methods.
